Jonas Luebbers is a creative developer living in Brooklyn. You can find him on Are.na, and Github.

Squarespace Creative Developer Homepage, prototyping, landing pages 2017–present Ben Sifel Web Development, Realtime Graphics Custom site on Cargo Collective 2018 Julie Moon Web Development, Design Custom static site 2018 Shader Tutorial Realtime Graphics A tutorial for getting started with WebGL 2018 Mark Luebbers Web Development, Design Custom static site 2017 Marbled Paper Simulation, Realtime Graphics 2017 Tumblr Grid Web Development, Design A better way to view Tumblr likes 2016 Sky Simulation Simulation, Graphics Realtime raytracing for clouds and atmospheric scattering 2015 Monuments Procedural Generation, Drawing Drawings of L-System generated ruins 2016 Cross-Hatching Image Processing Rendering of photos with cross-hatched SVG lines 2016 Narrow Focus Procedural Generation, Drawing Print generated from a series of drawings in Williamstown, MA 2016 Eyes Through A Car Window Procedural Generation, Drawing 120 unique drawings generated with code 2015 Sketchbook Drawing, Architecture Observational sketches from Denmark, Sweden, Finland
